projects.title: New RESMAN
projects.description: New RESMAN (Resource Management) is a web-based application used internally in the Software Laboratory Center to manage assistants' teaching schedules, job allocations, and to find substitutes for teaching purposes. This is the revamped version of the old RESMAN application, which used an outdated technology stack and less maintainable code. It is built using React, .NET Core, Docker, and PostgreSQL. Developed for Research Interest Group (RIG) Program during my second year as a Software Laboratory Assistant.

projects.title: EduReach
projects.description: EduReach is an AI-powered education platform that summarizes PDF documents into traditional Indonesian languages like Javanese, Sundanese, and Batak â€” making learning more accessible in rural areas. Built in 30 hours, the app uses React, .NET Core, PostgreSQL, FastAPI, and Docker, and is deployed on Vercel and Google Cloud.
